text: Gilles Ségal (13 January 1929 – 11 June 2014) was a French actor and playwright. He starred in more than sixty movies beginning in 1954. He was born in Fălticeni, Romania. He is known for his role as a heist participant in Jules Dassin's Topkapi. Ségal died in France, aged 82. ==Some movies he was in== Movie Year Title Role Notes 1978 Mon premier amour 1970 The Confession 1969 The Madwoman of Chaillot 1964 Topkapi ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors
title: Gilles Ségal
